title: The Story That Hurts

panel_structure.description: Empty college classroom. The Architect as professor striking through a mechanical brain diagram on the blackboard. Evan sits alone in the front row, small and vulnerable in the large space.
panel_structure.focus: Rejecting reductionism in favor of meaning

panel_structure.description: Close-up: The Architect sitting on desk edge, professorial distance collapsed into compassionate presence. Evan's face shows raw vulnerability. The struck-through diagram visible but blurred in background.
panel_structure.focus: Two consciousnesses sharing the burden of awareness

transformation_notes: This scene transforms the problem of suffering from a malfunction to be fixed into an inherent aspect of consciousness that matters. The empty classroom becomes a sacred space for existential questions.
dialogue_rhythm: From intellectual rejection to emotional recognition to philosophical comfort
narrator_role: Tender witness to consciousness confronting its own capacity for pain
